floors.name: Hospital Basement
floors.description: Your first day as a resident. Learn the basics in the safe environment of the basement.

boss.name: Basement Supervisor
boss.description: The supervisor has some basic questions to test your knowledge.

floors.name: Radiation Oncology Department
floors.description: Time to apply your knowledge in a clinical setting.

boss.name: Department Chair
boss.description: The department chair has challenging clinical scenarios for you.

floors.name: Linear Accelerator Room
floors.description: Advanced challenges with the department's treatment machines.

boss.name: Chief Medical Physicist
boss.description: The department head has challenging questions about QA procedures.
